医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
阿片类药物使用对内分泌系统的隐藏影响内分泌学会今天发布的一份新的科学声明强调了与阿片类药物使用对内分泌系统负面影响相关的研究空白。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/The-hidden-effects-of-opioid-use-on-the-endocrine-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/The-hidden-effects-of-opioid-use-on-the-endocrine-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2d19e03-3eb2-4ad2-ae22-995d5d980068 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 08:56:53 -0400 The hidden effects of opioid use on the endocrine system
提醒可提高老年人的记忆力德克萨斯大学阿灵顿分校的一项新研究表明，设置提醒可以消除一些与年龄相关的记忆力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Reminders-boost-memory-performance-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Reminders-boost-memory-performance-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2979fcc3-e4cb-463a-b949-ec06e03e179b Fri, 25 Oct 2024 08:41:28 -0400 Reminders boost memory performance in older adults
FUSE：彻底改变基因突变分析我们的研究引入了一种名为 FUSE（功能替代估计）的新工具，可以帮助科学家更好地了解基因变化如何影响蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/FUSE-Revolutionizing-the-analysis-of-gene-mutations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/FUSE-Revolutionizing-the-analysis-of-gene-mutations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34c742f7-a05a-48d0-86df-a0b627253df0 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 08:35:09 -0400 FUSE: Revolutionizing the analysis of gene mutations
水中低浓度的砷暴露与心脏病风险增加有关研究表明，长期接触饮用水中的砷会使缺血性心脏病的风险增加 42%，这凸显了制定更严格的水安全标准的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Low-level-arsenic-exposure-in-water-linked-to-increased-heart-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Low-level-arsenic-exposure-in-water-linked-to-increased-heart-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fc1b761-080f-4909-bad3-93a8bd33f94a Fri, 25 Oct 2024 08:31:00 -0400 Low-level arsenic exposure in water linked to increased heart disease risk
总统选举使平价医疗法案重新成为焦点医疗保健突然成为总统选举最后冲刺的前沿和中心，其结果将影响《平价医疗法案》及其为超过 4000 万人提供的保险范围。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Presidential-election-puts-Affordable-Care-Act-back-in-the-bulle28099s-eye.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Presidential-election-puts-Affordable-Care-Act-back-in-the-bulle28099s-eye.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40d90052-6f8e-4ae4-b23d-955c9e6f2b2b Fri, 25 Oct 2024 08:19:43 -0400 Presidential election puts Affordable Care Act back in the bull’s-eye
独家：电子邮件揭示了卫生部门如何努力追踪人类禽流感病例几周内，该国的禽流感病例增加了一倍多，但研究人员无法确定为什么会出现激增，因为七个月来对人类感染的监测一直不完整。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Exclusive-Emails-reveal-how-health-departments-struggle-to-track- human-cases-of-bird-flu.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Exclusive-Emails-reveal-how-health-departments-struggle-to-track- human-cases-of-bird-flu.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fef58e8c-fb6f-4cef-a0f9-c5f9c70b16d8 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 08:18:07 -0400 Exclusive: Emails reveal how health departments struggle to track human cases of bird flu
背部问题是否受到肠道影响？研究结果表明，肠道微生物群失调可能会影响腰椎退行性脊柱滑脱，从而影响炎症和疼痛管理策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Are-back-problems-influenced-by-your-gut.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Are-back-problems-influenced-by-your-gut.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f752b446-7d75-448d-8912-e9003cd4666a Fri, 25 Oct 2024 07:44:00 -0400 Are back problems influenced by your gut?
英国将禁止一次性电子烟，以保护青少年健康和环境英国立法将于 2025 年 6 月禁止一次性电子烟，旨在解决青少年尼古丁成瘾问题以及与电子烟废物和锂电池相关的环境问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/UK-to-ban-disposable-vapes-in-effort-to-protect-youth-health-and-environment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/UK-to-ban-disposable-vapes-in-effort-to-protect-youth-health-and-environment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81fd35ce-22c8-442b-89b9-0bbcf1e8f64e Fri, 25 Oct 2024 06:03:00 -0400 UK to ban disposable vapes in effort to protect youth health and environment
限制快餐店可以减少儿童超重和肥胖研究表明，限制快餐店可以降低儿童肥胖率，凸显了规划政策在健康结果中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Limiting-fast-food-outlets-can-reduce-childhood-overweight-and-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Limiting-fast-food-outlets-can-reduce-childhood-overweight-and-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=548c1fe7-2c9b-4fc7-8525-037ec4fe8bfa Fri, 25 Oct 2024 05:20:00 -0400 Limiting fast-food outlets can reduce childhood overweight and obesity
专家敦促英国结束夏令时，理由是夏令时对睡眠和昼夜节律健康产生负面影响研究表明时钟的变化会扰乱睡眠模式。专家敦促全年恢复标准时间，以增强昼夜节律健康和整体福祉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Experts-urge-UK-to-end-daylight- saving-time-citing-negative-impacts-on-sleep-and-circadian-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Experts-urge-UK-to-end-daylight- saving-time-citing-negative-impacts-on-sleep-and-circadian-health.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17a94cfc-c047-4136-935f-4ad69bb5ac5d Fri, 25 Oct 2024 04:47:00 -0400 Experts urge U.K. to end daylight saving time, citing negative impacts on sleep and circadian health
